GetClassType.name: GetClassType
GetClassType.description: Get the type of this class.

GetName.name: GetName
GetName.description: Get the name of the current style.

SetName.name: SetName
SetName.description: Set the name of the current style.

params.name: sStyleName
params.description: The name which will be used for the current style.

GetType.name: GetType
GetType.description: Get the type of the current style.

GetTextPr.name: GetTextPr
GetTextPr.description: Get the text properties of the current style.

GetParaPr.name: GetParaPr
GetParaPr.description: Get the paragraph properties of the current style.

GetTablePr.name: GetTablePr
GetTablePr.description: Get the table properties of the current style.

GetTableRowPr.name: GetTableRowPr
GetTableRowPr.description: Get the table row properties of the current style.

GetTableCellPr.name: GetTableCellPr
GetTableCellPr.description: Get the table cell properties of the current style.

SetBasedOn.name: SetBasedOn
SetBasedOn.description: Specify the reference to the parent style which this style inherits from in the style hierarchy.

params.name: oStyle
params.description: The parent style which the style inherits properties from.

GetConditionalTableStyle.name: GetConditionalTableStyle
GetConditionalTableStyle.description: Get a set of formatting properties which shall be conditionally applied to the parts of a table which match the requirement specified on the sType parameter.

params.name: sType
params.description: The part of the table which the formatting properties must be applied to.
